Class ActionBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.ActionBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Delete, Execute, Install, OtherActions, Update

    public abstract class ActionBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class, gets the defaults string values from the configuration file.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Fati CHEN
